subtitleNullable: A dataset which consists of Augmented images of 4 different cricket shots.
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is a collection of images from the internet, played really amazing player (So, can hope for perfection in shots). Then the data was augmented to give rise to the data I provide in front of you.

General Information:
1. The directory `drives` consists of the cover drive, straight drive and off drive.
2. The directory `legglance-flick` contains the images for the leg glance and flick shot.
3. The directory `pullshot` has the images for pull shot.
4. The directory `sweep` has the image for sweep shot.

This dataset can be used for various purposes. It can be used for:
* Classification
* Pose Estimation, etc.

__Note__: This dataset is already augmented and some images may be pretty bad. I would suggest to __not__ augment it further.
title: Cricket Shots Dataset
subtitle: A dataset which consists of Augmented images of 4 different cricket shots.
description:
